_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

How extinguishment is visible in this ve: A greedy person, overcome by greed
They intend to hurt themselves, hurt others, and hurt both
They experience mental pain and sadness
When greed has been given up
They don’t intend to hurt themselves, hurt others, and hurt both
They don’t experience mental pain and sadness
